content.detailedDescription: In 1982 i woke from shiftwork and went down to thelake to wade and pick rocks and stones from the lakebottom to assist my brotherbuilding a breakwater along the shore. my b my brother  was w2eary and lay downasleep. the night before i had seen someone at work and was very angry as ithought about it that day.   i continued to dig in the lakebottom when i noticeda black strobe-like effect coming through the top of my head.  i looked up towhere it was and there in a tree was a ball of moving sine-waves of light.  iwas astounded at this novel thing with the flowing sine
content.summary: Telepathaic close encounter of fifth kind with bal

content.detailedDescription: 1.I was in my car driving to work2.It cloudy thatday and at first i thought it was a cloud but it wasnt3.I thought it was acloud moving across the sky4.I was confused because i didnt know what itwas5.It just floated across the sky6.I had to go in the opposite direction
content.summary: I saw a gray wierd shaped object, like a half moon

content.detailedDescription: We were at home, in the backyard, barbecuing. we like to scan the night sky andwe noticed what appeared to be a satellite. we enjoy spotting them. we wereconfident of what we thought we were seeing until it left our view andreappeared from a different direction. it came out of nowhere. it travelednorth, appeared to stop and hover, danced around, then stopped again, grewintensely brighter, like a lit magnesium strip, and then faded away.
content.summary: Appears like a satellite but lasts only 4-8 second
Lights in the sky

content.detailedDescription: to whom it may concern: back in 1971 or 1972 inthe month of sept. myself and seven friends were in an open field that wassurrounded by a tree line.We were in the town of katonah ny which is about 50miles north of manhattan. it was dark and around 9
content.summary: Object changing light colors hovering ,excel.High

content.detailedDescription: I was oustide playing with my 2 year old son when i heard a sound that soundedlike a strange plane sound. it sounded like a cross between a lawn mower,helicopter and small plane.  i looked up and saw it flying towards the santaclara valley area, it looked like a flying arrow.  i was shocked because i hadnot seen anything like that before.  it flew very fast so i only got to see itfor a few seconds.  i drew a picture of it and put it athttp://www.Lothlorien.Com/egret/plane.Jpg.  is this ufo an experimental aircraftthat is known?   it sort of looked like a rocket...
content.summary: I saw something that looked like a flying arrow

content.detailedDescription: I was on my bed about to fall asleep when a plane passed then a sec later a bluedisc like object,which i tought was another airplane,came into view heading inthe other direction and then stopped at about half of my window then hhoveredand stuff with pulsating lights. the object remained after another plane passedby then it just vanished in thin air.
content.summary: Blue disc once again
Witnessed solid orange coloured, rectangular shape

content.detailedDescription: Witness description as given via original report:at 8:00 pm nov. 15, 2001, my wife and i noticed a large object, with red andwhite lights around the perimeter of its triangular shape (it had a steadyblinking white light near its aft) almost directly over our small local airport,moving slowly north to south.  the object was much larger than a helicopter andmoved to slow to be a passenger jet. itemitted a low, humming noise as it passed over.  we got into our van and wentsouth of town where the object slowly disappeared.  we watched for a few minutesasking each other if what we saw was real or imagined.  after returning home(10-15 minutes since we first saw the object) there it was again, this timemoving south to north...Same lights, same noise.  my wife mentioned at the timethat she was having difficulty focusing on the object.  i grabbed my camera andtook some shots that did not come out.  we got into the van and headed north towhere we last saw the object.  when we stopped and got out, we didnot see the object but we did see four jets (flying in military formation)moving north to south, when suddenly one jet broke off and flew to the west forseveral seconds before rejoing the group.  we watched the jets fly south andjust as they were to go out of sight, another jet broke off, flew east then backtowards us and then continued moving northwest.  we did not see the objectanymore but did call the local police, who said they did get some calls and thathe faa had been notified.  a follow up call the next day got us absolutelynowhere.  we did notice that our home radio, which was tuned in to a localstation had gone to total static and would only fix itself after i turned it offthen on again.
content.summary: Boomerang shaped object emits humming sound in mic
I saw three bright lights that traveled fast ,blin

content.detailedDescription: Me and my mother were on the sofa watching tv when two shinny, metalic objectscaught my eye. i shouted to my mom and we both ran to the glass, sliding door.In the sky two spheres about a mile away rushed through the sky. my mother firstthaught it was a jet, but soon changed her mind, because the objects weresoaring at speeds close to 1,000 miles per hour! the objects danced in the skyas they soared east. soon they disappeared behind a few trees and i ran out toget a closer look. there was a strange but faint sound in the air. when ifinally spoted them agian they were still dancing eastward, and soon they zoomedup into the clouds.
content.summary: They were white and shinny. looked like two sphere

content.detailedDescription: My girlfriend and her kids saw a very large, brilliant oval hovering 10 feet offthe ground to their left about 150 ft. at nightfall, just after exiting rt.50-32 onto state rt. 139 in se ohio.  a woman had left her car nearby and wasapproaching the object on foot.  alarmed, my friends drove away, and did notthink to mention it to me an hour later!
content.summary: Large brilliant object hovering 150 ft away

content.detailedDescription: i was driving east at night when i saw twostationary pulsating red lights above a field to the north. they resembled towerbeacons but i thought there were no towers in that vicinity so i stopped to lookat it. i then noticed a bright star-like white light that was ascending towardsthe red lights. when it reached the red lights the white light disappeared.About twenty seconds later the red lights started to move in a nnw direction. iwatched as they slowly faded into the distance. it was overcast that night, icould discern any structure, however the two red lights maintained theredistance from each other and remained paralell to the ground throuout the event.No sounds detected. if feel i witnessed something highly unusual as i have noexplanation for it.Benjamin hart
content.summary: Two stationary red lights and one moving white lig

content.detailedDescription: I was at home when we heard a report of objects over a police scanner.We wereunsure of what the objects were but they were very bright, it was suggested thatperhaps they were search lights from helicopters.Ridgecrest is a fairly smalltown (about 4 miles across east to west), it adjoins a naval air weapons testingcenter.09we heard a call on our police scanner that unidentified objects had beensighted by the college on the eastern edge of town.  about a mile past the eastedge of town.09my father and i drove towards the college along with several civilians andcity police.09when we reached the craft were they had made it down the mountain and wereheaded straight towards994 mountain.  this route took them over main street and numerous homes.  theywere traveling slowly enough to be followed by cars and were about 1000 feet up.09the craft eventually moved into the naval base air space and the police wereunable to pursue them further.09my father was a communications specialist and did work on the communicationsrepeater atop b mountain so he had keys to all of the locked gates and clearancepasses as well.  the front gate guards were watching the craft in amazement anddid nothing to stop us from proceeding.  we started up the mountain on a windingroad.  we could see the ships periodically as we turned towards them on theroad.  they  were making better time than us and when we came around one of theturns they were on the ground about 300-500 feet from us.09we sat for a while watching them and then headed up the mountain a ways sothat we could turn around and head home.  we drove up the road for a very shortdistance to a turn out and when we came back down (less than 5 minutes) thecraft were no longer there.09after that we went back home and the next day we contacted a friend of thefamily who was on duty with the police that night and he said93it never happened.94  there was also no report of the incident in the news papers or from thenaval base that i am aware of.09the craft were extremely luminescent.  the entire craft was bright white.  idon92t recall seeing any light sources.  simply that the entire craft was lit up(apparently from the inside).  i could, however, make out the shape of it andcould see defining lines.  they were diamond shaped except that the top half wasabout half again as long as the bottom.  they were bright enough that whenstopped together on the mountain the entire side of the mountain was illuminatedlike daylight.09i could not make out landing structures when they were93landed94.  they were rested on their lower point but nothing was holding them up. also, i did not see any form of propulsion.09we did not know what they were but it was suggested to us at the time thatthey may have been helicopter search lights.  having viewed them at close rangefor an extended time i must disagree with this assumption
content.summary: Diamond shaped extremely luminescent craft

content.detailedDescription: While having a nml conversation with theson of a neighbor and actually telling him of seeing the following descriptionwhile on the base just recently. before the nite in ?  it was a very bright orbof light that did not emit any glare so as to be unable to gaze at it.  when itmoved across the treetops it left a noticeable trail then disappeared.  ittravel for about a 100 yards as if wanting me to notice it.Previous to thisevent and again late nite i noticed the same type of orb while taking in thenite air.  it moved at treetop lvl but when noticed by me immediatelydisappeared as if a swith turned it off, and still a noticable trail was left.
content.summary: White orb with trail.

content.detailedDescription: it was the middle of the night , and i woke up forsome strange reason. i looked out thewindow and saw that there was some thinggoing on and i decieded that i would watch it for a while . my thought that itmight have been an airplane, but but then i did not see any blinking light  likeyou would see on an airplane.The object was moving left right and in circles andwould drop things, and when a car or other object would go by, it would stop fora while and then start up again.The object went higher than my window and therefor i could not locate it after that.
content.summary: The ufo was circular in shape

content.detailedDescription: I was in palm springs, ca., i was on my way to wash the car, the moon was fulland over to the east, i noticed an object coming from below the moon and crossedits face then stopped about 5 degrees above the moon for about 2 to 3 minutesand then decented to the south of the moon and then crossed it once again to thenorth where it hovered for about 10 minutes over the city of desert hot springs,the object was triangler in shape stood upright and rotated reflecting the sunslight every 2 to 3 seconds, i continuted on my way and lost track of the object,but noticed it once again about 30 minutes later over the city of palm desert,ca., kept my eye on it for about 10 minutes and then it started to disappear andlost track.Were there any other witness to this event?
content.summary: Saw upright 3d silver triangle

content.detailedDescription: I was removing snow from the roof of abuilding at the corner of the bodenberg and plumley rd. intersection in 1992.  inoticed everything was glowing blue and i called my renters outside.  we allthen observed a blue beam about 6 inches in diameter short out a utilitytransformer and cause the wires to start whipping.  then the object placed thebeam into a substation about 100 feet from me and caused arcing and sparking.  inotified the military one base commander of the 3rd composite wing in anchorage,ak while the object was still hovering.  i informed him the object was headedwest towards the elmendorf air base.  he believed me and told me no radarsignatures were being seen.  he knew exactly where i was and he even mentionedif i was near the metal building on the corner which was absolutely correct. the snow storm front was just passing and he asked me if i was on the edge ofthe storm front which was also correct.
content.summary: Aeriel object projecting blue beam onto electrical

content.detailedDescription: travelling west on bell road approaching tatumblvd. intersection when i noticed a bright light kinda similar to a searchlight, but stead and not moving.  at first i thought it was a police helicopter(1 or 2 as large and very bright) as news reported looking for a burglar. thought they must be searcing that area.  the light kinda faned out or got widerfrom top to bottomonly can think of search light as comparison.  it was kinda near the arizonapublic service electric company office where they have trucks stored in back andi dont know what else.  the light kinda indicated somebody/something was beinglooked for.  as i went through intersection, i looked away and then looked back. when i looked back light was gone and there was like cloud of smoke whichslowly dissipated...Nothing there.  i looked all over for some type of plane butthere was nothing there.  in the past i have seen bright, broad bands of lightin the sky which seemed to disappear the minute i see them.  they usually gohorizontally from start to finish very quickly.  im always looking for ufos. so far, i have only seen lights.
content.summary: Bright search light

content.detailedDescription: i was outside finishing a conversation withmy mother.  over her right shoulder i suddenly saw a long, dark object with anunblinking green light shoot diagonally down and disappear behind the treeline. there was no sound.  i was astonished at first, but as i had seen another yearsbefore and had strange dreams concerning ufos and beings, i felt elated andhappy, almost as if seeing it was reassuring to me.  after, i had furtherexperiences of precognition.
content.summary: Saw long craft with unblinking green light.
Visual light then tracked on radar and computer

content.detailedDescription: I was looking at computer screen when i looked out my window and there was abright light just north and over pikes peak. at first i thought it was a star,but the stars were not out at that time. the light was steady (no blinking) igot 2 of my bonoculars out and watched with my son this thing hover in thesky.We watched for about 10 min. and then it drifted behind the mountain.
content.summary: Over pikes peak a bright light that was not moving

content.detailedDescription: My 2 brothers my 2 sisters and i were playing in the front yard. we had a bikerace to our corner. when we got there we saw a large glowing disk. it washumming, buzzing, and made a whineing sound. at first i thought of it to be ablimp. then i heard it buzz. it hoovered there for 2 minutes then it started tomove.I was amazed. i ran to my house to get my camera. then i saw it inside mybackyard. i took a picture. then it vanished right out of the sky. when i tookthe film in  the pictures diddnt come out. that is what i saw
content.summary: Saw one luminated large disk

content.detailedDescription: My 2 brothers my 2 sisters and i were playing in the front yard. we had a bikerace to our corner. when we got there we saw a large glowing disk. it washumming, buzzing, and made a whineing sound. at first i thought of it to be ablimp. then i heard it buzz. it hoovered there for 2 minutes then it started tomove.I was amazed. i ran to my house to get my camera. then i saw it inside mybackyard. i took a picture. then it vanished right out of the sky. when i tookthe film in  the pictures diddnt come out. that is what i saw

A flashing light in the sky that didnt move.

content.detailedDescription: it was 1966 ..Iwas 11 yrs old at thetime,this has been bugging me for 35 yrs,i am 46 yrs old now..My sister and istill tell our kids the story. my cousins and i and sister were walking into thewoods to a clearing in the woods.All of a sudden the sky and stars were gone,,weall looked straight up and saw blackness with about fifty or so lights in aradious around the black part about fifty ft up. fifty yard radious ..All thelights were moving in place but pointing every where as if they were spotlightsmoving very,very very,fast..We saw no so called ship ,,just blackness and whitelights,,we all ran .Since then i feel i have been changed somehow..I canremember it like a photograph and no sound of any kind could beheard,,,wind,,animals  ufo  ,,,nothing,,till we were far from the spot,and wetalked about it.It bugs me now that we did not see much,,but why is it imprintedinto my head  of what we saw or did not see ,,wierd !!!!!
content.summary: 1966..Black ufo.With white flashing lights about 1
